TITLE: WISE DECISIONS

PRODUCER: JADE YANG

PRESENTER: JADE YANG

TRANSMISSION DAY: FRIDAYS

TRANSMISSION TIME: 7:30pm

LANGUAGE: MANDARIN

SOURCE: LIVE

TARGET AUDIENCE: YOUNG ADULTS

PHILOSOPHY: Wise Decisions is a program aimed at helping young adults make informed choices in their everyday lives. Life is full of decisions, big and small, and the consequences of these choices can be far-reaching. The program uses stories from history, literature, and real life experiences to provide valuable insights and lessons on how to make the right choices.

Wise Decisions is an Edutainment program that combines informative content with catchy music and engaging visuals to create a lively and entertaining experience. Each episode will feature a specific theme, such as friendship, relationships, career, and personal growth, and will explore the different options and outcomes that are possible.

Through expert analysis and discussion, the program will help the target audience develop critical thinking and decision-making skills that they can apply to their own lives. The program will also feature interviews with successful individuals who will share their personal stories of making tough choices and overcoming challenges.

Wise Decisions is not just about making the right choices; it is also about learning from mistakes. The program will encourage viewers to reflect on their own experiences and learn from their failures. Through this process, the program aims to foster a growth mindset and promote resilience and perseverance.

At the end of each episode, viewers will be encouraged to share their thoughts and questions on social media using a specific hashtag. The program will also provide additional resources and tools to help viewers make informed decisions.

Wise Decisions is not just another television program; it is a platform for personal growth and self-improvement. By tuning in each week, young adults can gain valuable insights and skills that will help them navigate the complex world around them.
